summary: A group of cryptographers have analyzed the eiDAS 2. 0 regulation (electronic identification and trust services) that defines the new EU Digital Identity Wallet.

summary: Latest survey reveals just 8% of organizations qualify as highly mature in the cloud.  Our results describe what sets them apart and the big benefits that follow

summary:
If you're seeing this in your RSS reader, it means I didn't completely fuck up the launch of my redesigned site.  Hooray. 
Yes, I successfully left Squarespace to venture off into the world of front end development, and have rebuilt this with Eleventy...

summary:
There have been some noises about this week's newsletter issue in which I criticized the release of AWS Compute Optimizer offering RDS recommendations. Let me clarify my position and commentary on this feature announcement.

title: “Apparently I Stuttered: A Compute Optimizer Clarification”
